original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>使用趁火打劫計謀失敗。(<color=#bceea7>趁火打劫 失敗</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to use <color=#fff999>$country1</color> to take advantage of the fire and rob the scheme and fail. (<color=#bceea7>Take advantage of the fire and fail to rob</color>)
